items

Class GenericRestorationItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • items.Item
      • items.ConsumableItem
        • items.GenericRestorationItem

  • public class GenericRestorationItem
extends ConsumableItem
    generic ConsumableItem subclass that can increase a CrewMember's fullness or health (or both).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GenericRestorationItem(java.lang.String name, int value, int healthAmount, int fullnessAmount)
      Generic Food Item is a basic restoration class for crew hunger.

      Generic Food Item is a basic restoration class for crew hunger.
